Pre-Game Insights: Congo DR have kicked up the campaign with two wins from their opening two matches and will head into the game in search of a sixth competitive home victory since June 2022.
Tanzania picked up their first win in the AFCON qualifying race last time out as they fought back from behind to secure a 2-1 victory over Guinea.
Others: Congo DR and Tanzania return to action in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers when they go head to head at the Stade des Martyrs on Thursday.

The Leopards have strengthened their stake for a place in the 2026 FIFA World Cup as they have now picked up seven points from four games in Group B of the qualifiers to sit third in the table, three points behind Sudan in the automatic qualification spot.
Tanzania have picked up four points from their opening two in the 2025 AFCON qualifying race to sit second in the standings, two points off Thursday's hosts at the top of the pole.
